verbose_text: The addition of acetate stimulated rates of CH 4 production in a fen peatland soil, whereas addition of hydrogen (H 2), and simultaneous inhibition of H 2 -consuming acetogenic bacteria with rifampicin, stimulated CH 4 production in two acidic bog soils, especially, in autumn and winter.
evidence: hydrogen (H 2 ), and simultaneous inhibition of H 2 -consuming acetogenic bacteria with rifampicin, stimulated CH
